root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 3-7-1, translated into en
root.data: Metadata of indicator “3.7.1. Proportion of households with large health expenditures relative to total expenditures or total incomes”quite similar to the metadata of the global indicator“ 3.8.2: Proportion of population with large household expenditures on health as a share of total household expenditure or income”.
